trg_text: The Torremolinos Convention and its Protocol of 1993 lay down safety standards, such as life-saving appliances, radio communication, fire protection, machinery and electrical installations, as well as specific requirements for seagoing fishing vessels of 24 metres and longeThis binding international safety regime will contribute to improving safety standards in order to reduce the number of fatalities at sea, estimated at 24 000 annually worldwid South Africa s fishing vessels will be subject to the provisions of the protocol when in the waters of a State party to the 1993 Torremolinos protocoThis is in line with Operation Phakisa s objectives of developing an institutional framework for the management of South Africa s ocean space, improving the protection of South Africa s oceans, particularly around critically endangered ecosystems, and addressing the skills gap, amongst otherCabinet approved for South Africa to accede to the International Convention on Standards of Training, Certification and Watch-keeping for Fishing Vessel Personnel, 1995 (STCW-F).This is the first attempt to establish international mandatory training standards for the crews of seagoing fishing vessels of 24 metres or more in lengt This will improve the safety of life and property at sea, as well as to prevent pollution of the marine environment by the fishing industrIn the past, extended periods of sea service were seen as the way to acquire experience and appropriate skill This system of on-the-job training has not produced a quality outcome for the skills of the creThe new system is built around a combination of reduced experiential training with upgraded and more structured education for enhancing knowledg This will make it possible for fishers to progress over time from small vessels to large fishing vessels and eventually internationally trading vesselCabinet approved for the following 2015 commemorative coin designs by the South African Mint Company, to be promulgated in a Government Gazett

src_text: irelet egilego go baithuti ka thekgo le t homi ano ya makala a tii et o ya mola Kabinete e dumelet e Taelo ka ga Tlhabollo ya Kgapelet o, Mat at i a Tlhahlo a Kgapelet o le Dinyakwa t a Fase t a Botseno go maemo a Tirelo ya Taolo ya Godimo bjalo ka ge go laedit we go ya ka Karolo ya 3(2) ya Molao wa Tirelo ya Set haba wa 1994.Se se godi a tlhabollo ya bokgoni gore go latelwe maikemi et o a Leanotlhabollo la Boset haba (NDP) bja go aga mmu o wo o hlabologago le wo o nago le bokgoni bja go hola kabo ye e kaonafet ego ya tirelTaelo ye ke leano la tlhabollo ya bokgoni la lebaka le le telelele bjo bo tlago oket a boleng bja methopo ya bomotho yeo e lego bohlokwa go bokgoni bja mmu o bja go phethagat a thomo ya onDikgoro ka moka ka gare ga Tirelo ya Set haba di tla nyakega gore di amogele mokgwa wo o sa fetogego go godi a tlhabollo ya bokgoni bja kgapelet o le bja maleba ka gare ga Tirelo ya Bolaodi bja Godim Kabinete e dumelet e Kgoro ya Tekolo le Tshekatsheko ya Mo omo go ala sengwalwa sa Tokomane ya Poledi ano ka ga Melawana le Mekgwa ya Tekolo le Tshekatsheko ya Mo omo go Komiti ya Potefolio ya Palamente ka ga Tshepedi o ya Tirelo ya Set haba le Tekolo le Tshekatsheko ya PeakanyTokomane e
trg_text: Key Cabinet decisionsCabinet approved the publication of the draft National Learner Transport Policy for public comments in the Government Gazette for 21 dayThe policy improves access to quality education by providing safe, decent, effective, integrated and sustainable learner transport, especially in rural communities where transportation challenges hinder access to educatioThe policy addresses spatial challenges and re-organisation of operations which impact on the quality of public transpor It also provides for an integrated planning system and uniform standards of managemenImplementation of this policy will provide a safe and secure transport environment for learners through cooperation and collaboration with law enforcement authoritieCabinet approved the Directive on Compulsory Development, Mandatory Training Days and Minimum Entry Requirements to the levels of Senior Management Service as determined in terms of Section 3(2) of the Public Service Act, 1994.This promotes skills development so as to respond to the National Development Plan objective of building a capable and developmental state for the benefit of improved service deliverThe directive is a long-term skills development strategy that will enhance the quality of human resources which is critical to government s capacity to deliver on its mandatAll departments in the Public Service will be required to adopt a consistent approach to promote relevant and mandatory skills development within the Senior Management ServicCabinet approved for the Department of Performance Monitoring and Evaluation to present the draft Discussion Document on Performance Monitoring and Evaluation Principles and Approach to Parliament s Portfolio Committee on Public Service Administration and Planning Monitoring and EvaluatioThe document proposes a set of basic principles and an approach to Performance Monitoring and Evaluation (M&E) that is intended to result in continuous improvement in government performance and increased accountabilit Its key objective is to build consensus on the objectives of M&E, and how it should be implementeThis contributes to the implementation of the National Development Plan (NDP) in relation to building a capable and developmental state as well as promoting an active citizenry and strong leadershi M&E competencies are part of the core managerial competencies that are required for a capable and developmental statCabinet approved South Africa s negotiating positions for Conservation of Migratory Species of Wild Animals (CMS COP11) which will be held in Quinto, Ecuador, from 4 to 9 November 2014.South Africa s active participation in addressing challenges of climate change and the conservation of nature and associated species is based on the principle of sustainable development and environmental sustainability, and is in line with the requirements of Section 24 of the Bill of RightCabinet approved the negotiating mandate that will serve as the basis for South Africa s engagement at the 20th session of the Conference of Parties to the UNFCCC (COP 20), and the 10th Conference of Parties serving as the meeting of Parties to the Kyoto Protocol (CMP 10), from 1 to 12 December 2014, in Lima PerSouth Africa s position is in line with the country s national interest, and the implications for South Africa s further engagement in the international climate change negotiations as outlined in the National Development PlaCabinet approved a submission of the Cape Town Agreement of 2012 on the implementation of the provisions of the Torremolinos Protocol of 1993 relating to the International Convention for the Safety of Fishing Vessels, 1977 for ratification by Parliamen

src_text: oma bjalo ka motheo wa karolo ya Afrika Borwa tulong ya bo20 ya Khonferentshe ya Bat eakarolo ba UNFCCC (COP 20), le Khonferentshe ya bo10 ya Bat eakarolo ye e tlogo ba bjalo ka kopano ya Bat eakarolo ba Kwano ya Kyoto (CMP 10), go tloga ka la 1 go fihla ka la 12 Manthole 2014 go la Lima kua PerMaemo a Afrika Borwa a sepelelana le kgahlego ya boset haba ya naga, le dikhuet o t a go t ea karolo ga Afrika Borwa bjo bo t welago pele ka dipoledi anong t a phetogo ya klaemete ya bodit habat haba bjalo ka ge go laedit we ka gare ga ND Kabinete e dumelet e go romelwa ga Kwano ya Motsekapa ya 2012 ka ga phethagat o ya mabaka a Kwano ya Torremolinos ya 1993 ya go amana le Kopano ya Bodit habat haba ya Polokego ya Dikepe t a Boreahlapi, 1977 gore e kgonthi i we ke PalamentKopano ya Torremolinos le Kwano ya yona ya 1993 di laet a maemo a polokego, go swana le ditlabakelo t a go boloka bophelo, kgokagano ya radio, t hirelet o ya mollo, go tsenywa ga mohlagase le met hene, le dinyakwa t e it eng t a dikepe t e di reago dihlapi lewatleng t a dimetara t e 24 le go fetMokgwa wo wa polokego ya bodit habat haba wo o tlemago o tla thu a go kaonafat a maemo a polokego go fokot a palo ya dipolao ka lewatleng, t e di akanyet wago go 24 000 ka ngwaga lefaseng ka bophar Dikepe t a Afrika Borwa di tla laolwa ke mabaka a kwano ge di le ka meetseng a Mmu o wo o lego karolo ya kwano ya Torremolinos ya 1993.Se se sepelelana le maikemi et o a Operation Phakisa a go t welet a tlhako ya instit hu ene ya taolo ya sekgoba sa Afrika Borwa sa lewatle, a go kaonafat a t hirelet o ya mawatle a Afrika Borwa, go dikologa diekhoseseteme t e di lego kotsing kudu, le go

trg_text: Marine Protected Areas of South Africa Cabinet was briefed on the Rationalisation of Magisterial Districts and Areas of Jurisdiction of the Divisions and Local Seats of the High Court of South AfricThe rationalisation of courts project reverses the legacy of inequality and injustic It establishes a blueprint which will guide all affected departments, law enforcement agencies and justice institutions to align their operations accordinglPreviously marginalised communities living in the former homelands, self-governing states and rural villages will now benefit from the outcomes of the rationalisation proces They will be able to access courts at reduced costIn providing access to justice, it is necessary to rationalise the old apartheid-drawn areas of jurisdiction of all the courts, including their composition and structur The rationalisation process ensures that there is an equitable distribution of the courts in the country, to enhance access to courts, which is a fundamental human right enshrined in Section 34 of the Bill of Right in the Constitution BillsCabinet approved the introduction of the Maintenance Amendment Bill, 2014 in ParliamenThe Bill amends the Maintenance Act, 1998 (Act 99 of 1998) to improve the maintenance system and enhance access to justice for women and childreThe amendments alleviate the challenges, legal and administrative, experienced by maintenance beneficiaries, who are mostly women and childreThis links directly to the key targets of the National Development Plan on economic transformation and social protectioSome of the provisions of the Amendment Bill include: preventing maintenance defaulters from continuing to receive credit while they owe maintenance, placing an obligation on mobile cellular operators to provide maintenance courts with contact particulars of would-be respondents and maintenance defaulters if the court is satisfied that all reasonable efforts to locate their whereabouts have proven fruitless, and making a person against whom a maintenance order has been made, pay maintenance arrearCabinet approved the submission of the Agr ment South Africa Bill and the Memorandum on the Objects of the Bill to ParliamenThe establishment of Agr ment South Africa, as proposed in the Agr ment South Africa Bill, 2014 will contribute to the creation of a dynamic and innovative construction sector that will positively impact on job creation while contributing to Government s infrastructure planThe value-add would be wide ranging from research to innovation, increased manufacturing activities, job creation and poverty alleviatioCabinet approved the introduction of the draft Auditing Profession Amendment Bill in ParliamenThe Amendment Bill proposes amendments to the Auditing Profession Act, 2005, to regulate candidate auditors and to update references to the Companies Act, 1973 so as to align the Auditing Profession Act with the Companies Act 2008 (Act N 71 of 2008).The aim is to bring aspiring auditors (candidate auditors), before registration, under the Auditing Profession Act, 2005 so that they are regulated by the Independent Regulatory Board for Auditors, in the same way that registered auditors are regulated, and to make significant amendments required by the Companies Act 2008.

src_text: Se se tla dira gore melao ya t hirelet o e sepelelane le dit o t a bjale t a molaotheo ka go nt ha mabaka a kgethollo ka pukung ya molao Phethagat o ya Mananeo a Bohlokwa a Mmu oKabinete e keteka le maAfrika Borwa moketeko wa Let at i la Tokologo ya Bobegaditaba ka la 19 Diphalane 2014 leo Mopresidente Jacob Zuma a bego a kopane le babegaditaba le barulaganyi ba bomahlwaadibona bjalo ka karolo ya go keteka mengwaga ye 20 ya tokologo ya bobegaditaba ka Afrika Borw Let at i la Tokologo ya Bobegaditaba ke la keteko ya tokologo ya polelo ya bobegaditaba yeo e tii eledit wego ka gare ga molaotheo wa renMopresidente Zuma, a felegedit we ke maloko a Kabinete, Tonakgolo ya KwaZulu-Natal le Malekgotlaphethi i a Profense ba swere Imbizo ya Mopresidente ka Mebasepaleng wa Msunduzi le wa uMgungundlovu ka la 30 Lewedi 2014.Bjalo ka kgokagano ye e t welago pele le ye e lebant hago dit haba t a maAfrika Borwa, Mopresidente Jacob Zuma o tla swara lesolo la Siyahlola la Mopresidente go la Giyani kua Limpopo ka la 31 Diphalane 2013 Kabinete e amogela pego ya kgatelopele ka ga phethagat o ya Kwano ya Tlhako ya Intasteri ya Meepo ye e Swarelelago ya go alwa foramong ya Boset haba ya dipoledi ano t a Lekala la MeepForamo e laet a boikgafo bja t homi ano ya bat eakarolo ka moka go bokamoso bja meepo ka Afrika Borwa, le go tlholo le tlhokomelo ya tekanet o ye e lekanago gare ga dinyakwa t a ekonomi le leago le maikemi et o a peelet Kabinete e amogela go ikgafa leboelela ga bat eakarolo go Kwano ya Tlhako ya Intasteri ya Meepo ye e Swarelelago le khwet ong ya ditharollo t a go ya go ile ditlhohlong t e intasteri e lebanego nat Kabinete e amogela tsebi o ya Mopresidente Jacob Zuma ka ga kgatelo pele ye e dirilwego ka Operation Phakisa go bula bokgoni bja ekonomi ya mawatle a Afrika Borwa ka mokgwa wa go swarelelLenaneo la kabo ka Mopresidente Jacob Zuma le kgauswi le go laet a dipoelo t e di botse t a ekonomi ya lewatle, yeo e kago tsenya R177 bilione go t welet o ya rena ya ka gare ga naga ka kakaret o le go hlola me omo ya ka godingwana ga milione o moteProt eke ya bobedi ya Operation Phakisa e thomile ka la 13 Diphalane 2014 gomme e tla

src_text: et a dikliniki t e di

omago botse ka mokgweng wa rena wa maphel Dihlophat homo mo lebakeng la dibeke t e tshela di tla nyaki i a lekala le go t welet a mananeo a kabo ao a tlogo lokollelwa set haba ge di phethilwKabinete e amoget e Pego ya Pholisi ya Tekanyet o ya Lebaka la Magareng (MTBPS), yeo e abago kakaret o ya tlhako ya ditshenyegelo yeo ditekanyet o t a profense le t a boset haba di loki wago ka gare ga yonKabinete e amogela magato a a tsebi it wego ka gare ga MTBPS go thibela t homi o ya t helete ka gare ga Tirelo ya Set habKabinete e tii elet a maAfrika Borwa gape gore le ge klaemete ye ya ekonomi ye boima e tla t wela pele go thekga mananeo a yona a leago ka dit helete, dipeelet o t a mananeokgoparara le diputselet o go thekga diintasteri t e bohlokwa Maemo a Kabinete ka ga Merero ye e lego Ditabeng Seemong sa Bjale Kabinete e amogela magato ao a beilwego ke Kgoro ya Enet i go kaonafat a t hirelet o ya enet i ya naga, go fihlelela dinyakwa t a ekonomi le go hlola me omo ye e nyakegago kud Tshaeno ya dikwano t a dikamano t a go kgabaganya mebu o t a nuklea ke kgato ya maleba go ya t hirelet ong ya dinyakwa t a enet i t a nagDikwano t e di saennwego di tlalelet a sehlopha sa baabi ba nyutleliara bao naga e tlago kgetha go t wa go bona bakeng sa lenaneo la theko ya nyutleliara le go laet a phihlelelo ye nngwe kgatong ya naga ya go bea pele t hirelet o ya enet Tshepet o ye e batamet a naga ka kgato e tee kgauswi le go aloga go t wa go polante ye e lego gona ya enet i ya nyutleliara go la Koeberg go ya go intasteri ya nyutleliara ye e akaret ago go feta le go kgona go ipha thekgo yeo e letet ego go aba GW ya mohlagase go keriti ya boset habNDP e gafela naga go nyaki i a dikgetho t a enet i ka moka t e di lego gona go

src_text: irelet a kabo ya rena ya ka moso ya enet
Kabinete tshepo gore motswako wa enet i wa Afrika Borwa woo
o akaret ago enet i ya malahla, let at i, moya, meetse, gase le nyutleliara

o tla kgonthi i a mothopo wa go tshepega wa mohlagase go fihlelela dinyakwa t a kgolo ya naga, go dumelela tekanet o gare ga methopo ya enet i le go re thu a go fihlelela dithakete t a rena t a phokot o ya khapon Kabinete e amogela le go lebogi a bat eakarolo ka moka kgatong ya go bula gape Palamente ya Lesotho beke ya go feta go sepelelana le Pego ya Thu o ya Maseru ye e sepedit wego ke Motlat amopresidente Cyril Ramaphos Kabinete e boelet a gore Afrika Borwa e beile magato a maleba go thibela Ebola go phatlalala ka nagenTlhokomelo ya mabopo a botseno ka moka e matlafadit we go hlaola malwet i a kokwanatlhoko ya tobo ye kgolo ya madi, kudu Ebol Mmu o gape o hlomile sehlopha sa boset haba sa tlhakodi o go letela bolwet i gomme dipetlele t e 11 di loki it we bjalo ka disentha t a kalafo ya EbolKabinete e thekga maiteko ka Mokgatlo wa Lefase wa Maphelo ka go hloma disentha t a Ebola le go matlafat a bokgoni bja diteko t a laporatori, go lota mohlala, thuto ya set haba, dipoloko t e di bolokegilego le tlhokomelo ya maphelo ye e sego ya Ebola ka Bodikela bja AfrikKabinete gape e ipilet a go batho le dikgwebo lefaseng ka bophara go thu a ka Sekhwama sa Tlhakodi o ya Ebola seo se hlomilwego go thu a dinaga ka moka t a Bodikela bja Afrika t e di amegilego ntweng kgahlanong le bolwet i bjo bo kotsi bj Kabinete e amogela go swarwa ga batho ba tshela ba ba amant hwago le bohodu bja megala bjo bo hlot ego tlhokego ya meetse ka dikarolong t a Gauten Batho ba e be e le karolo ya sehlopha sa basenyi seo go kwagalago gore maphodisa a se

src_text: walalant e ka go se tswalelela ka kgolegon Kabinete e laedit e kgopolo ya gore bohodu bja megala le ditiro t a go amana nabjo

dikhurumelo t a melete ya kelelat hila, diporo t a leporogo, dipala t a mohlagase, magora, bjalobjalo bo swana le tshenyo ya ka boomo ya lenaneo la naga la mananeokgoparar Mmu o o tla kgonthi i a gore batho ba swarelwago go ba lemegala ye e utswit wego ba tla lebana le dikotlo t e boima t e di fiwago ke mola Mmu o o amilwe ke taba ye gomme o ka se diege go t ea kgato ye e swanet ego kudu go lwant ha bothata bjKgwebi ano le Peelet o t a Afrika Borwa (TISA), karolo ya Kgoro ya Kgwebi ano le Intasteri (dti), beke ya go feta e amoget e sefoka Khonferentsheng ya Dit habakopano Foramong ya Peelet o ya Lefase ya Kgwebi ano le Tlhabollo go la Geneva bakeng sa kgodi o ya peelet o ye e swarelelag Se e be e le sa mo omo wo o dirilwego ke TISA thekgong ya tlhomo ya polante ya Indonesia ya Unilever go la Ethekwini, yeo e but wego ke Tona ya Kgwebi ano le Intasteri nakong ya ge Afrika Borwa e be e swere kopano ya COP 16 Kabinete e amoget e tshedimo o ya bjalebjale ka ga phuhlamo ya moago go la Nigeri Pego ya ka thoko e tla fiwa morago ga kopano ye Ditiragalo t e di tlago Mopresidente Jacob Zuma o tla fa polelokgolo ya pulo ka fase ga kgwekgwe ye
Lefase Bjalo ka wo Mongwe wa Mebaraka e Megolo ye e Thomago go Gola , Khoferentsheng ya innovaBRICS & Beyond go la London ka la 27 Diphalane 2014.

Khonferentshe e kgoboket a baetapele ba mmu o le dikgwebo ka ditshepedi o goba kgahlego ya mebaraka ye e thomago go gola, go nyaki i a le go ahlahla menyetla ya peelet o le ditlhohlo ka gare ga mebaraka yKabinete e amogela Khonferentshe ya innovaBRICS & Beyond bjalo ka monyetla wa go bapat a Afrika Borwa bjalo ka lefelo la peelet o go dikgwebo t e di theilwego United Kingdom le mebaraka ye mengwe ye e thomago go golMopresidente Zuma o tla amogela Mopresidente Pierre Nkurunziza wa Burundi ka la 4 Dibatsela go la Motsekap Ketelo e tla tii et a kamano ya dinaga t e pedi ye e lego gona ya go tia le Burundi le go t wet a pele kgwebi ano ya dit welet wa t a go swana ka kontinentenKgoro ya Meetse le Kelelat hila, ka t homi ano le Lekgotla la Afrika la Ditona ka ga Meetse (AMCOW), Khomi ene ya Dinyaki i o t a Meetse t a Afrika Borwa, SADC le Basadi ba T homi ano ya Meetse, e tla swara Khonferentshe ya Bong, Meetse le Tlhabollo go la East London go tloga ka la 3 go fihla ka la 7 Dibatsela 2014 ka fase ga kgwekgwe ye:
Bong, Meetse le Tlhabollo
kamano ye e sego ya
omi wa .Lenanethero la khonferentshe le tla dirwa ke Pholisi le Leano la Tlwaelo ya Bong ya AMCOW ka Lekaleng la Meetse ka Afrika, leo le nago le maikemi et o a
upa ao a

edit ego go pholisi, methopo, nyaki i o ya leano, kago ya bokgoni, t homi ano le tekolo le tshekatsheko, go fihlela maikemi et o a kakaret o boleng bja bong ka gare ga pholisi ya meetsKabinete e lakalet a baithuti ka moka mahlatse ge ba itoki et a ditlhahlobo t a mafelelo a ngwag Ditlhahlobo t e ke sekala sa mohola ya magato a tsenogare a thuto ya rena go swana le Dikelo t a Boset haba t a Ngwaga ka Ngwaga (ANA) le Setatamente sa Pholisi ya Kelo le Kharikhulamo (CAPS).Kabinete e amogela tii et o ya Umalusi ya gore naga e itoki it e go sepet a ditlhahlobo t a Marematlou gare ga la 27 Diphalane le ka la 28 Dibatsela 2014.Batswadi, bahlokomedi le dit haba ka moka ba hlohlelet wa go thekga baithuti ge ba itoki et a ditlhahlobo t a bonGape kabinete e lakalet a mphato wa marematlou wa 2014 mahlatse ditlhahlobong t a bona t e di tlag Kabinete gape e hlohlelet a batswadi le bahlokomedi go thekga Dikgetho t a Makgotlataolo a Dikolo t a 2015 go tloga ka la 6 go fihla ka la 28 Hlakola 2015 ka go ba bonkgetheng goba ka go kgethKabinete e ipilet a go maAfrika Borwa ka moka go thekga Kgwedi ya Boset haba ya Lesolo la Ditokelo t a Bagolofadi gare ga 3 Dibatsela le 3 Manthole 2014 ka fase ga kgwekgwe ye:

Go keteka mengwaga ye 20 ya ditokelo t a bagolofadi ka gare ga Temokrasi ya rena .Go tloga ka 1994 re dirile dikgato t e kgolo t wet opeleng ya ditokelo le boleng bja bophelo bja bagolofadi ka molao, dipholisi le magato a tsenogare a leag Go ya ka Tekodi i o ya Mengwaga ye Masopedi go tloga ka 1994

2014, Kantoro ka ga Maemo a Bagolofadi e hlomilwe, Leano la Boset haba la Bagolofadi le le Kopant wego le amoget we, gwa abiwa tlhokomelo ya maphelo ya mahala, gomme thu o ya leago le thuto ya go akaret a di fiwa bagolofadNDP e gafela go dira go feta bjalo ka set haba go oket a phihlelelo ya ditirelo, kudu ka thuto ya boleng le me omo ya bagolofadKa moya wa Kgwedi ya Dinamelwa, Kabinete e ipilet a go ba omi i ka moka ba tsela go hlokomela kudu ditseleng t a rena ka go hlokomela magomo a lebelo le go kgonthi i a gore dikoloi di loket e tsel Mmu o o ipilet a go basepela ka maoto go

omi a ditsela ka tlhokomelo le gore ba omi i ka moka ba tsela ba hlomphane Bao ba thwet wego me omong Kabinete e amoget e go thwalwa mo omong ga batho ba ba latelago go Boto ya Setheo sa Boset haba sa Dinyaki i o:a) Moprofesa Mala Singh (o thwet we gape);b) Moprofesa Mamokgethi Phakeng;c) Moprofesa Ari Sitas;d) Moatbokheiti Louisa Zondo;e) Moprofesa Tinyiko Maluleke;f) Ngaka Vathiswa Papu-Zamxaka;g) Mohumagadi Gail Campbellh) Morena Mashangu Lubisii) Moprofesa Errol Tyobeka (o thwet we gape);j) Moprofesa Sunil Maharaj (o thwet we gape)k) Ngaka Peter Clayton (o thwet we gape);l) Moprofesa Loyiso Nongxa (Modulasetulo);m) Mohumagadi Joanne Yawitch; len) Moprofesa Murray Leibbrandt (o thwet we gape).

Kabinete e amoget e go thwalwa mo omong ga batho ba ba latelago go Boto ya Ditlhatlhobo t a Tokeloa) Mohumagadi Elena Mihail Zdravkova;b) Moprofesa Christiena Maria van der Bank (o thwet we gape);c) Mohumagadi Shanaaz Tiry (o thwet we gape);d) Mohumagadi Sandra Clelland (o thwet we gape); lee) Morena Paul Sibisi (o thwet we gape).

Kabinete e amoget e go thwalwa mo omong ga Maloko a Lekgotla go Lekgotla la Dikhamphania) Moprofesa Kasturi Moodaliyar;b) Moatbokheiti Lizelle Dominique Haskins;c) Morena Mmoledi Fairhope Malokane; led) Morena Peter John Veldhuize Kabinete e amoget e go thwalwa mo omong ga batho ba ba latelago go Boto ya Lekala la Afrika Borwa la Difofane t a Set habaa) Morena Smunda Mokoena (Modulasetulo);b) Moprofesa Ntombizozuko Dyani-Mhango;c) Majoro-Mogenerala Nhlanhla Lucky Job Ngema;d) Mohumagadi Lizeka Dlephu;e) Moatbokheiti Roshan Dehal (o thwet we gape);f) Mohumagadi Doris Dondur (o thwet we gape); leg) Morena Mongezi Indi Kabinete e amoget e go thwalwa mo omong ga batho ba ba latelago ba Bahlokomedi ba Terasete ba e sego ba Phethi i go Boto ya Sekhwama sa Boset haba sa Matlafat a) Morena R Garach;b) Morena A Raiz;c) Mohumagadi Z Ntlangula;d) Mohumagadi N Mosala;e) Mohumagadi A Makwetla; lef) Mohumagadi J William Kabinete e amoget e go thwalwa mo omong ga Morena Fundisile Mketeni bjalo ka Mohlankedimogolo Phethi i (CEO) ya Ma oka a Diphoofolo a Boset haba a Afrika Borwa (SANParks) ka konteraka ya mengwaga ye mehlano (5).
Kabinete e katolo it e konteraka ya Mohumagadi Thuli Radebe bjalo ka CEO ya Sentha ya Boithomelo ya Tirelo ya Set haba (CPSI) ka mengwaga ye mengwe ye meraro (3).
Kabinete e amoget e go thwalwa mo omong ga Mohumagadi Lakela Kaunda bjalo ka Mohlankedimogolo wa Ditshepedi o ka Ofising ya MopresidentDipot i o: Morena Donald LiphokoMogala: 082 901 0766
